objects.text:
• Unique bohemian-inspired design
• Premium leather construction
• Comfortable padded insole
• Durable rubber outsole

product_details.name: Artisan Comfort: Boho-Chic Designer Sneaker with Handcrafted Details
product_details.description:
• Unique bohemian-inspired design with decorative scalloped patterns
• Premium beige and tan leather construction with artisanal stitching
• Comfortable padded insole with light blue interior lining
• Durable rubber outsole with distinctive bubble texture
• Stylish brown contrast laces for adjustable fit
• Hand-detailed ornamental elements on toe and heel
• Lightweight and flexible construction for all-day wear
• Perfect blend of casual comfort and artistic expression
• Available in unique earth-tone color combination
• Ideal for fashion-forward individuals seeking distinctive footwear

banner_details:
The banner is a modern promotional composition, featuring a stylish sneaker targeted at a premium fashion audience. It’s split into four quadrants using soft, earthy tones that flow together harmoniously. The top-left quadrant includes a bold headline (`heading_1` and `heading_2`) followed by a sleek subheading (`subheading`). The bottom-left presents product features in a clean bullet list (`description`), includes a bold pricing detail (`price`), and a call-to-action button area (`cta_background` with `cta` text). The right half showcases the product image (`product_image`) with soft overlapping decorative elements (`decorative_circle` and background SVG). A limited-time tagline (`tagline`) reinforces urgency.

**Color Palette:**  
- Light Beige (#E8DBC9)  
- Sandy Tan (#D6BFA0)  
- Warm Brown (#A67244)  
- Rich Mocha (#5E3719)  
- Pale Cream (#F5EDE3)  
- Soft Blue (#89CFF0, mildly transparent)
product_color: The product image showcases a creatively designed sneaker in a warm, earthy color palette that can inspire a visually harmonious advertisement banner. Dominant hues include burnt orange (#C75A27), tan (#DCAE78), cream (#F3E5C2), caramel brown (#B66B2D), and sandy beige (#E5C39F). These tones are smoothly blended across different segments—laces, overlays, and texture details—offering a rich yet cohesive aesthetic. The use of highlights in cream outlines and shadows in deeper browns adds depth and dimension. The vibrant yet grounded palette evokes energy, tradition, and craftsmanship, making it ideal for a banner that emphasizes artisanal quality and warmth.
